Author: thoughtpatrol20
Text: 200 x 7 = 1,400 calories/wk  1,400 x 8 weeks = 11,200 calories  11,200/3,500=3.2 lbs in 2 months.  Compare this with the caloric cost of binging. Every other week would be 4 binges. 11,200/4 = 2,800cal/binge.  IMO, binges are more of a threat. They also demoralize you and erode discipline. Eat the 700.
